meanings.definition: A person who engages in risky or dangerous activities.
meanings.sent1: The hazarders climbed the steep mountain without proper gear.
meanings.sent2: The hazarders in the group always seek out thrilling adventures.
meanings.sent3: The hazarders decided to go skydiving without checking their parachutes first!
meanings.sent4: Like fearless warriors, the hazarders charged into the unknown territory.
meanings.sent5: The hazarders faced the roaring waves with determination and courage.

meanings.definition: Those who take risks or chances without considering the potential consequences.
meanings.sent1: The hazarders at the casino bet all their money on a single hand.
meanings.sent2: Some hazarders invest in risky stocks without doing proper research.
meanings.sent3: The hazarders thought it would be fun to swim with sharks without a cage!
meanings.sent4: The hazarders danced on the edge of disaster, oblivious to the looming danger.
meanings.sent5: In their pursuit of excitement, the hazarders ignored the warning signs.
